attributes.action: modify this system such that petitions can register 'NO' votes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many petitions exist on this site that have been created by people, who, while well-intentioned, fail to grasp basic principles of economics or common sense.

Such petitions can currently only attract support.  It should be possible to register an opinion contrary to the petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
